pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 x32 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6320 or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+(2*2.6 GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) or equivalent / Radeon HD 6450 (512 MB) or equivalent / Iris Pro Graphics 5200 (1792 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 x32 and x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E7300 or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ (2*3 GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 440 (1024 MB) or equivalent / Radeon HD 6670 (1024 MB) or equivalent / Iris Pro Graphics 5500 (1792 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
